sdk-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
sdk-staging.post-deploy: npm i ; npm update ; grunt compile --sites=fake-news --env staging ; pm2 restart 0 -- fake-news --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking repo-name and restarting app.'; git pull git@github.com:esalling23/fake-news.git master;
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; npm i ; grunt compile --sites=fake-news --env staging ; pm2 restart 0 -- fake-news --env staging

sdk-production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
sdk-production.post-deploy: npm install ; npm update ; grunt compile --sites=fake-news --env production ; pm2 restart 'server' -- fake-news --env production

production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking repo-name and restarting app.';
production.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; grunt compile --sites=fake-news --env production ; NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart server.js -- fake-news --env production
